title: Application Developer II
jobDescription:
• Clarifies and defines issues arising from the Access to Demo Environments through a collection of data and appropriate questioning; repeats the message to ensure understanding.
  • Identifies apply and communicates existing solutions/workarounds to issues.
  • Forward issues not defined in Support documentation to Gold Environments Level3-4
  • Track issues to report periodically the Support Activity data (n. issues-open-closed, issue type, n. issue forwarded to Level3-4)
Intermediate:
  • Demonstrates through questioning, accurately defines issues clarifies potential issue causes, and gets the requester to review recent actions/events.
  • Takes responsibility for issues and resolves routine issues with minimal assistance; rarely passes on a problem.
  • Attempts many ways to resolve issues before forwarding the issue to Level3-4
  • Explores unfamiliar areas to solve issues, but where necessary seek help on time.
  • Define improvement to the support procedure, support documentation available as Level 1 Self-Service support and periodic reporting.
Skilled:
  • Adept at issue clarification through understanding of related Functional or process need.
  • Constructs reproducible test cases and identifies likely points of failure before contacting Gold Environments Level3-4 on product related issues.
  • Identifies new issues and rapidly develops support solutions.
  • Take governance of the support procedure from a continuous innovation point of view.

title: Android App Developer
tagsAndSkills: Automation,Web development,Social networking,Data structures,Healthcare,JSON,Unit testing,Android SDK
jobDescription:
Android App Developer

Development of applications for mobile devices on Android operating systems. Highly motivated individuals with a pleasant personality, Communication, and good organizational skills to work as an Android professional.

Experience : 1+ Years Job Role : Full-Time Location : Jaipur, IN Requirements :-
  • All-equipped with the latest in Android technology
  • Hands-on experience working with Android SDK, Kotlin and Framework
  • Experience with Git, JSON, Volley, Gradles
  • Fundamentals in object-oriented programming, data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis
  • Knowledge of general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
  • Familiar with Social Login integrations, SOAP, OAuth2, REST API integrations, and Unit Testing in Android
Job Responsibilities :-
  • Creating advanced applications for the Android platform
  • Unit-testing code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
  • Work with outside data sources and APIs
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features

title: BlackBerry Application Developer
jobDescription:
Hunter Tech Ventures Pvt Ltd is looking for BlackBerry Application Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Design, develop, and maintain software applications to meet business needs and requirements
